name: Untitled Cube Game (Isaac)
description:
A simple 3D cube game made by following a tutorial by Brackeys on YouTube, WASD to move, and have fun

Yes, I haven't changed anything from the original tutorial so far, but I'll try to change it a little and give some unique features in future versions, for now, have fun with the 3 levels :)

Credits: Thanks to Lucas and Edel for testing this game

(EDIT: I'm not gonna make future versions because this is my first game and I was only having a try at Unity, I want to move onto other things like first-person shooters now, so bye. If you follow me to get notifications, or I'm not sure if there are notifications I'm new to itch.io, that'll be great)

PS. 

This game was not meant to be seen by the public it was made for my classmates to try out but if you're just a random stranger from somewhere in itch.io and you came across this, well done to you and the itch.io algorithm
